attributes.action: Allow exemptions for long established family businesses which will be hit by the scrapping of taper relief and the new blanket 18% capital gains tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new 18% Capital Gains Tax may be designed to close a loophole currently being exploited by private equity companies but it will also considerably increase the taxation levied when family businesses are sold to fund retirement. This tax change has increased the capital gains tax on long-held businesses enormously and will have a very detrimental effect on the retirement plans of many thousands of owners of small businesses.
